item.text: The Lord spoke to Moses and Aaron:

“<st data-num="01696" class="">Speak</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="01121 03478">Israelites</st> and <st data-num="0559" class="">tell</st> them, ‘<st data-num="03588" class="">When</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">any</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="01961" class="">has</st> a <st data-num="02100" class="">discharge</st><n id="2" /> from his <st data-num="01320" class="">body</st>,<n id="3" /> his <st data-num="02101" class="">discharge</st> is <st data-num="02931" class="">unclean</st>.

Now this is his uncleanness in regard to his discharge—whether his body secretes his discharge or blocks his discharge, he is unclean. All the days that his body has a discharge or his body blocks his discharge, this is his uncleanness.
“‘Any bed the man with a discharge lies on will be unclean, and any furniture he sits on will be unclean.

<st data-num="0376" class="">Anyone</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> <st data-num="05060" class="">touches</st> his <st data-num="04904" class="">bed</st><n id="1" /> must <st data-num="03526" class="">wash</st> his <st data-num="0899" class="">clothes</st>, <st data-num="07364" class="">bathe</st> in <st data-num="04325" class="">water</st>, and <st data-num="02930" class="">be unclean</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">until</st> <st data-num="06153" class="">evening</st>.<n id="2" />

The one who <st data-num="03427" class="">sits</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="03627" class="">furniture</st> the man with a <st data-num="02100" class="">discharge</st> <st data-num="03427" class="">sits</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> must <st data-num="03526" class="">wash</st> his <st data-num="0899" class="">clothes</st>, <st data-num="07364" class="">bathe</st> in <st data-num="04325" class="">water</st>, and <st data-num="02930" class="">be unclean</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">until</st> <st data-num="06153" class="">evening</st>.

The one who <st data-num="05060" class="">touches</st> the <st data-num="01320" class="">body</st><n id="1" /> of the man with a <st data-num="02100" class="">discharge</st> must <st data-num="03526" class="">wash</st> his <st data-num="0899" class="">clothes</st>, <st data-num="07364" class="">bathe</st> in <st data-num="04325" class="">water</st>, and <st data-num="02930" class="">be unclean</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">until</st> <st data-num="06153" class="">evening</st>.

<st data-num="03588" class="">If</st> the man with a <st data-num="02100" class="">discharge</st> <st data-num="07556" class="">spits</st> on a person who is <st data-num="02889" class="">ceremonially clean</st>,<n id="1" /> that person must <st data-num="03526" class="">wash</st> his <st data-num="0899" class="">clothes</st>, <st data-num="07364" class="">bathe</st> in <st data-num="04325" class="">water</st>, and <st data-num="02930" class="">be unclean</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">until</st> <st data-num="06153" class="">evening</st>.

<st data-num="03605" class="">Any</st> <st data-num="04817" class="">means of riding</st><n id="1" /> that the man with a <st data-num="02100" class="">discharge</st> <st data-num="07392" class="">rides</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> will <st data-num="02930" class="">be unclean</st>.

<st data-num="03605" class="">Anyone</st> who <st data-num="05060" class="">touches</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">anything</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">was</st> <st data-num="08478" class="">under</st> him<n id="1" /> will <st data-num="02930" class="">be unclean</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">until</st> <st data-num="06153" class="">evening</st>, and the one who <st data-num="05375" class="">carries</st> those items<n id="2" /> must <st data-num="03526" class="">wash</st> his <st data-num="0899" class="">clothes</st>, <st data-num="07364" class="">bathe</st> in <st data-num="04325" class="">water</st>, and <st data-num="02930" class="">be unclean</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">until</st> <st data-num="06153" class="">evening</st>.

<st data-num="03605" class="">Anyone</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">whom</st> the man with the <st data-num="02100" class="">discharge</st> <st data-num="05060" class="">touches</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">without</st> having <st data-num="07857" class="">rinsed</st> his <st data-num="03027" class="">hands</st> in <st data-num="04325" class="">water</st><n id="1" /> must <st data-num="03526" class="">wash</st> his <st data-num="0899" class="">clothes</st>, <st data-num="07364" class="">bathe</st> in <st data-num="04325" class="">water</st>, and <st data-num="02930" class="">be unclean</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">until</st> <st data-num="06153" class="">evening</st>.
A clay vessel which the man with the discharge touches must be broken, and any wooden utensil must be rinsed in water.
“‘When the man with the discharge becomes clean from his discharge, he is to count off for himself seven days for his purification, and he must wash his clothes, bathe in fresh water, and be clean.
Then on the eighth day he is to take for himself two turtledoves or two young pigeons, and he is to present himself before the Lord at the entrance of the Meeting Tent and give them to the priest,
and the priest is to make one of them a sin offering and the other a burnt offering. So the priest is to make atonement for him before the Lord for his discharge.
“‘When a man has a seminal emission, he must bathe his whole body in water and be unclean until evening,

and he must <st data-num="03526" class="">wash</st> in <st data-num="04325" class="">water</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">any</st> <st data-num="0899" class="">clothing</st> or <st data-num="05785" class="">leather</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">has</st> <st data-num="07902 02233">semen</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> it, and it will <st data-num="02930" class="">be unclean</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">until</st> <st data-num="06153" class="">evening</st>.
As for a woman whom a man goes to bed with, then has a seminal emission, they must bathe in water and be unclean until evening.
“‘When a woman has a discharge and her discharge is blood from her body, she is to be in her menstruation seven days, and anyone who touches her will be unclean until evening.

<st data-num="03605" class="">Anything</st> she <st data-num="07901" class="">lies</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> during her <st data-num="05079" class="">menstruation</st> will <st data-num="02930" class="">be unclean</st>, and <st data-num="03605" class="">anything</st> she <st data-num="03427" class="">sits</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> will <st data-num="02930" class="">be unclean</st>.

<st data-num="03605" class="">Anyone</st> who <st data-num="05060" class="">touches</st> her <st data-num="04904" class="">bed</st> must <st data-num="03526" class="">wash</st> his <st data-num="0899" class="">clothes</st>, <st data-num="07364" class="">bathe</st> in <st data-num="04325" class="">water</st>, and <st data-num="02930" class="">be unclean</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">until</st> <st data-num="06153" class="">evening</st>.

<st data-num="03605" class="">Anyone</st> who <st data-num="05060" class="">touches</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">any</st> <st data-num="03627" class="">furniture</st> she <st data-num="03427" class="">sits</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> must <st data-num="03526" class="">wash</st> his <st data-num="0899" class="">clothes</st>, <st data-num="07364" class="">bathe</st> in <st data-num="04325" class="">water</st>, and <st data-num="02930" class="">be unclean</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">until</st> <st data-num="06153" class="">evening</st>.

<st data-num="0518" class="">If</st> there is <st data-num="01931" class="">something</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="04904" class="">bed</st> <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="03627" class="">furniture</st> <st data-num="01931" class="">she</st> <st data-num="03427" class="">sits</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st>,<n id="1" /> when he <st data-num="05060" class="">touches</st> it,<n id="2" /> he will <st data-num="02930" class="">be unclean</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">until</st> <st data-num="06153" class="">evening</st>,
and if a man actually goes to bed with her so that her menstrual impurity touches him, then he will be unclean seven days, and any bed he lies on will be unclean.

“‘When a woman’s discharge of blood flows many days not at the time of her menstruation, or if it flows beyond the time of her menstruation, all the days of her discharge of impurity will be like the days of her menstruation—she is unclean.

<st data-num="03605" class="">Any</st> <st data-num="04904" class="">bed</st> she <st data-num="07901" class="">lies</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="03117" class="">days</st> of her <st data-num="02101" class="">discharge</st> will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> to her like the <st data-num="04904" class="">bed</st> of her <st data-num="05079" class="">menstruation</st>, <st data-num="03605" class="">any</st> <st data-num="03627" class="">furniture</st> she <st data-num="03427" class="">sits</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> will <st data-num="01961" class="">be</st> <st data-num="02931" class="">unclean</st> like the <st data-num="02932" class="">impurity</st> of her <st data-num="05079" class="">menstruation</st>,
and anyone who touches them will be unclean, and he must wash his clothes, bathe in water, and be unclean until evening.
“‘If she becomes clean from her discharge, then she is to count off for herself seven days, and afterward she will be clean.

Then on the <st data-num="08066" class="">eighth</st> <st data-num="03117" class="">day</st> she must <st data-num="03947" class="">take</st> for herself <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="08449" class="">turtledoves</st> <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">young</st> <st data-num="03123" class="">pigeons</st>,<n id="1" /> and she must <st data-num="0935" class="">bring</st> them <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="03548" class="">priest</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">at</st> the <st data-num="06607" class="">entrance</st> of the <st data-num="04150" class="">Meeting</st> <st data-num="0168" class="">Tent</st>,
and the priest is to make one a sin offering and the other a burnt offering. So the priest is to make atonement for her before the Lord from her discharge of impurity.
“‘Thus you are to set the Israelites apart from their impurity so that they do not die in their impurity by defiling my tabernacle which is in their midst.

<st data-num="02063" class="">This</st> is the <st data-num="08451" class="">law</st> for the one with a <st data-num="02100" class="">discharge:</st> for the one <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> <st data-num="03318 04480">has</st> a <st data-num="02233" class="">seminal</st> <st data-num="07902" class="">emission</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="02930" class="">becomes unclean</st> by it,<n id="2" />
for the one who is sick in her menstruation, for the one with a discharge, whether male or female, and for a man who goes to bed with an unclean woman.’”
